subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Paolo Bettini won the first back-to-back world road race titles in 15 years on Sunday, drawing on raw anger after a week of criticism and court action to come from behind in a sprint finish.
snippet: Paolo Bettini won the first back-to-back world road race titles in 15 years on Sunday, drawing on raw anger after a week of criticism and court action to come from behind in a sprint finish.
